Name: Solid Flight
About the game: You are a licensed pilot and contract employee at Goldal Town Airport. You earn money delivering mail to remote homesteads in a mountainous area. You can rent a plane and fly wherever you want, explore the area and hunt animals. You can buy all the planes, and when you have saved enough money you can buy a stunt plane. Airplanes can run out of fuel, you can get lost because you can only navigate with a map and compass, different weather conditions can affect the flight.

Meta Description: Looking for information on Solid Flight? Check out the release date (Oct 31, 2022), developer insights from JE Creations, and a complete game summary.
